TextView.android:text: A very popular food chain known for their parathas. I haven't been to this place but have ordered online many times from this particular branch. (Not using Zomato) The parathas have been delivered so hot every single time that I actually had to struggle with the foil to unwrap it - that's how hot the parathas were. Some of the must try parathas are - Italian paratha, methi cheese corn garlic paratha and toofani paratha. They deliver parathas with Chutney, pickle, curd and cabbage salad. One paratha is enough for 1 person. Good quantity and good quality. Will definitely recommend this place if you like parathas.
